name: Maroon 2
description:
Our entry for this here Ludum Dare 42. We decided to make a sequel of sorts of our last game, Maroon. This time around, Elisa is running out of pavement, and must use the power-ups to get farther.

We are:

🔹Juliano Reis - Programming, Game Design, Level Design

Twitter: twitter.com/djudjubs

🔹Vitória Steckel - Art, Animationinstagram.com/vittusteckel/
